title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - | Maintain label and protection when import data to PowerBI (Web and Desktop)
description: This feature is for PowerBI creators who import data to PowerBI datasets or PowerBI Desktop files from Excel files applied with sensitivity label and/or Synapse, SQL databases that are classified with sensitivity labels. By default, PowerBI datasets and PBIX files will automatically inherit the sensitivity label from the source if perquisite conditions are met.
